Text: Remember, it´s feature freeze and bug bashing time for the final 2.0 release. Please help the developers ! If you´re sure you´ve found a bug, please report it on sourceforge.net. Have Fun with the new release ...
gas giver....im having problems using the emulators...says cannot load information??? any ideas??? the rest of the disc is shit hot!!!!!now i can play fight night 3!!
xboxerstuart: Emulators, Fight Night ??? This is just XBMC, nothing more nothing less - i dunno what you´re talking about, sorry.

You included scripts... YES!. er... 

But anyway it's nice when someone includes the python engine in their release. Clean2K5's didn't and for some reason after I tried adding it all back in it would play 1 second of any streaming vid from Flexi and just lock the box. Your release could be my salvation as a lot of end users I help out want that feature working.
Thank you for this relase GasGiver, i test it and report the bugs so they give it!! :) :)

Hi Gasgiver. 

Been using your releases since last year, and they 
are working great, no problems ever so far......

But ( and this is the only problem i ever had) 
with this last release the scripts dosn't work. 
Nothing happens when i select script menu. 

I'm using Pal 16:9 Project Mayhem III

Any thoughts, bits pieces or ide's ????
Latest stupidvideos script would be nice too se included for the next release. :)

Manzzon: Yep, i am missing this myself since the old one didnt work anymore - but atm ppl (including myself) still have probs with the new one - it hangs everytime after playing a video, only a restart helps to get out - besides that the script is looking VERY promising and works nice - so im gonna wait till this gets ironed out ... next release will have the new version of submenuedit though - if anyone cares ;-)
GasGiver4711: Yeah it looked ALOT better than the last one I tried, im running 720P so it looked even worse than normal. Hope they get it more stable very soon... ;)
